mapper.sql: oid, tid, seller_nick, buyer_nick, num_iid, total_fee, discount_fee, payment, modified, status, sku_properties_name, num, title, price, pic_path, outer_iid, outer_sku_id, item_meal_name, refund_status, main_tid, oid_bak, logistics_company, invoice_no, consign_time, sku_id

oid = #{oid}, tid = #{tid}, seller_nick = #{sellerNick}, buyer_nick = #{buyerNick}, num_iid = #{numIid}, total_fee = #{totalFee}, discount_fee = #{discountFee}, payment = #{payment}, modified = #{modified}, status = #{status}, sku_properties_name = #{skuPropertiesName}, num = #{num}, title = #{title}, price = #{price}, pic_path = #{picPath}, outer_iid = #{outerIid}, outer_sku_id = #{outerSkuId}, item_meal_name = #{itemMealName}, refund_status = #{refundStatus}, main_tid = #{mainTid}, oid_bak = #{oidBak}, logistics_company = #{logisticsCompany}, invoice_no = #{invoiceNo}, consign_time = #{consignTime}, sku_id = #{skuId}

ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE oid = VALUES(oid), tid = VALUES(tid), seller_nick = VALUES(seller_nick), buyer_nick = VALUES(buyer_nick), num_iid = VALUES(num_iid), total_fee = VALUES(total_fee), discount_fee = VALUES(discount_fee), payment = VALUES(payment), modified = VALUES(modified), status = VALUES(status), sku_properties_name = VALUES(sku_properties_name), num = VALUES(num), title = VALUES(title), price = VALUES(price), pic_path = VALUES(pic_path), outer_iid = VALUES(outer_iid), outer_sku_id = VALUES(outer_sku_id), item_meal_name = VALUES(item_meal_name), refund_status = VALUES(refund_status), main_tid = VALUES(main_tid), oid_bak = VALUES(oid_bak), logistics_company = VALUES(logistics_company), invoice_no = VALUES(invoice_no), consign_time = VALUES(consign_time), sku_id = VALUES(sku_id)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM x_order_info WHERE taobao_id = #{taobaoId} ORDER BY gmt_created DESC
